name: nature's walk standard blanket
notes:
**\#natureswalkcal**

originally released in parts as a crochet along together with black sheep wools in autumn 2019, the free blanket pattern is still available to download and enjoy.

*inspired by my surroundings as i take my daily walks with my dog bertie, this blanket is a beautiful and relaxing make designed to be soothing and fun.*

>now available as as pdf with bonus content: [nature's walk bonus edition][1]



**skill level**
*easy/intermediate*
this pattern mostly uses basic stitches worked in the round.  some intermediate stitches and techniques are used as the pattern and difficulty progresses, helpful photos and some tutorials are included.

**skills needed**
-to be able to follow a written pattern using uk or us crochet abbreviations.
-working in the round.
-basic uk stitches (eg: dc, tr, tr, dtr).
-it would also be helpful to know how to work decreases (eg: tr2tog, tr3tog).

**yarn**
available in a choice of three different packs available from black sheep wools.

*[wild hedgerow][2]*
28 balls of scheepjes stonewashed 4ply 
(50g -130m/142y, 78% cotton, 22% acrylic) 

*[open fields][3]*
28 balls of scheepjes stonewashed 4ply
(50g -130m/142y, 78% cotton, 22% acrylic) 

*[sweet meadow][4]*
16 balls of stylecraft bambino/belissima
(100g - 268m/293y, 100% acrylic)

or see the [nature’s walk pattern page][5] for full yarn details.

**hook**
3.5mm  (e us)
or size needed to obtain the correct gauge.

**other materials**
yarn needle to weave in ends.
stitch markers can be useful.

**size**
117 x 148 cm (46 x 58”)

**gauge**
22 sts x 10 rows per 10cm (4”) in treble crochet

**crochet terms**
uk or us crochet terms.

**free pattern includes**
- full and clearly written pattern directions
- stitch abbreviations
- 6 unique square motifs to create, plus an extra 'sample square'
- crochet charts for each of the 6 squares and sample square only (no border chart)
- blanket layout guide for the 6 squares
- links to helpful tutorials
- link to a 'getting started with charts' video

see [nature's walk bonus edition][6] for more help and additional content, including the 6 extra 'bonus' squares.

**cherry heart’s cozy corner** 
please come and join the [cherry heart group][7]! watch podcasts, join crochet/knit alongs, share your projects and enjoy yarny chit chat.

i love to see your projects… #natureswalkcal #cherryheart


  [1]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/natures-walk-blanket-bonus-edition#
  [2]: https://www.blacksheepwools.com/products/natures-walk-cal-colour-pack-scheepjes-stone-washed-wild-hedgerow
  [3]: https://www.blacksheepwools.com/products/natures-walk-cal-colour-pack-scheepjes-stone-washed-open-fields
  [4]: https://www.blacksheepwools.com/products/natures-walk-cal-colour-pack-stylecraft-bellissima-and-bambino-sweet-meadow
  [5]: https://www.cherryheart.co.uk/2019/08/natures-walk-cal.html
  [6]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/natures-walk-blanket-bonus-edition
  [7]: https://www.ravelry.com/groups/cherry-hearts-cozy-corner
